Package net.minestom.server.instance.palette

Class Palette

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.instance.palette.Palette
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, PublicCloneable<Palette>
@Internal public final class Palette extends Object implements PublicCloneable<Palette>
Represents a palette storing a complete chunk section.

0 is always interpreted as being air, reason being that the block array will be filled with it during initialization.

    • resize

      public void resize(int newBitsPerEntry)
      Resizes the array.

      Will create a new palette storage to set all the current blocks, and the data will be transferred to 'this'.

      Parameters:
      newBitsPerEntry - the new bits per entry count

    • clean

      public void clean()
      Loops through all the sections and blocks to find unused array (empty chunk section)

      Useful after clearing one or multiple sections of a chunk. Can be unnecessarily expensive if the chunk is composed of almost-empty sections since the loop will not stop until a non-air block is discovered.

    • clear
